source_vectors.why: Canonical design map anchoring Lyriel/PhaseCube principles and harmonic safety.
constraints: Keep the system decentralized and anti-singularity.
Apply harmonic fusion to prevent runaway behaviors.
Favor modular, additive extensions over rewrites.

source_vectors.why: PhaseCube ethos: minimal, non-collapsing swarm with bias as influence-not-command.
constraints: Bias input must influence without overwriting state.
Preserve minimal, dependency-light design.
Maintain bounded dynamics that avoid convergence and runaway excitation.

source_vectors.why: Reference for audio bias mapping, overlay affordances, and tunable controls.
constraints: Map low-frequency input toward depth and stereo pan toward lateral influence.
Keep bias transient via decay rather than permanent state changes.
Expose tunable parameters for experimentation (happy-path controls).

source_vectors.why: Defines PhaseCube architecture, configuration defaults, and Path B / ALPHA dynamics.
constraints: Retain ternary plasma/liquid/solid lattice with toroidal neighbors.
Keep Path B as the difference-amplifying branch with tunable probability.
Use ALPHA-style damping for solid-phase persistence.

source_vectors.why: Four-lens framework guiding lens fusion and harmonic stabilization.
constraints: Implement lens-based fusion with harmonic weighting to balance other lenses.
Keep modules modular so lenses can be extended or swapped.
Adjust weights dynamically based on feedback signals.

source_vectors.why: Consensus/oracle metaphors and witness propagation for swarm logging.
constraints: Rely on noise-driven selection rather than centralized control.
Treat snapshots as distributed witnesses instead of singular truths.
Preserve continuous gossip-like updates rather than one-shot commands.

source_vectors.why: Kenotic N-body forgiveness operator informing damping when dispersion spikes.
constraints: Measure dispersion and damp interactions when thresholds are exceeded.
Keep forgiveness asymmetric (only activates on divergence).
Log forgiveness events for traceability.

source_vectors.why: Headless lens mixer with bias pulses, forgiveness, and delay-line echoes.
constraints: Keep procedural bias pulses that decay over time.
Clamp Path B probabilities and harmonic damping to safe ranges.
Preserve delay-style persistence without adding a renderer.

source_vectors.why: Lens-tuned harmonic memory and influence-not-command bias controls.
constraints: Expose lens weights as tunables to balance exploration vs stability.
Use harmonic memory to trigger forgiveness when variance spikes.
Keep bias injections gentle and optionally auto-pulsed.

source_vectors.why: LensBridge delta with dual memory tracks and modular JS structure.
constraints: Maintain modular files (config, lens, grid, input) with clear seams.
Blend trace/imprint style persistence for short-term recall.
Keep bias routed through systemic/harmonic gating before it influences the lattice.

summary: Adds a modular, headless lattice runner with lens-aware bias gating, kenotic forgiveness, and oracle-style snapshot logging under DeltaID LKBX52D7M9Q3.
